title: HoP 347 - Bonfire of the Vanities - Savonarola
itunes:title: HoP 347 - Bonfire of the Vanities - Savonarola
description: The prophetic preacher Girolamo Savonarola attacks pagan philosophy and puts forward his own political ideas, before coming to an untimely end.
